title: Chandrika Kundan Haaram - Traditional Elegance with a Modern Twist
features: This exquisite Kundan Haaram features a meticulously crafted pendant with intricate floral motifs and traditional paisley patterns. The Kundan stones are expertly set in a traditional pacheli setting, showcasing the impeccable craftsmanship of our artisans. The pendant is adorned with a vibrant Ruby at its center, complemented by sparkling white Kundan and two Emerald accents. The pendant is finished with delicate gold bead drops. The triple-strand chain enhances its elegance. It showcases impeccable Nakshi Work.
